name: download_star_wars_character_information
description: Go to the [Star Wars API](https://swapi.co/). Get familiar with it. Once you're familiar, you will use [`node-fetch`](https://github.com/bitinn/node-fetch) to download the JSON for the first 10 people. You can get the JSON for a person through the `https://swapi.co/api/people/:id` URL.
author: Maxwell Gordon
